summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 12, John's Addition and block 12, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between 11th avenue North and 12th Avenue North, from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street; by paving all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89133, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
